long_desc.thetext:
Steps to reproduce: 1. Load the bug's URL [1];
Expected results: Application would load.
Actual results: Application displays nothing. The error console, within several CSS warnings/errors, holds hints on the likely cause:
Uncaught exception: TypeError: Cannot convert 'qx' to object [object-specific details follow]
Additional information: I've first noticed this in version 10.50 Internal (Build 3218), on Windows Vista SP2, so I'm not sure if that can be a browser regression. All seems fine in version 10.10 (Build 1893), which is the latest release as of this writing AFAIK.
I'm reporting this in the sense of trying to gather more feedback: * Linux/MacOS, anyone? (Please update the "OS" to "all" if able to reproduce on other platforms.) * Can someone test intermediate builds? (I remember 10.2 weeklies were made available before the Opera team dived into 10.5...)
I'm also placing a comment in the relevant Opera Desktop blog post [3] whenever possible. :-)
[1] http://demo.qooxdoo.org/0.7.4/demobrowser/ [2] http://my.opera.com/desktopteam/blog/ [3] http://my.opera.com/desktopteam/blog/2010/02/07/approaching-10-50-beta-for-windows

(In reply to comment #0) > I'm also placing a comment in the relevant Opera Desktop blog post [3] whenever > possible. :-)
If someone's interested in following the process, here's the link to it:
http://my.opera.com/desktopteam/blog/2010/02/07/approaching-10-50-beta-for-windows?startidx=350#comment18268531

No longer seen in a 10.5 weekly build (build 3257) [1]. Didn't check for the beta just launched but I'm confident that it's the same there (essentially, what really matters is that this will be in final release version).
Assuming (without a deep investigation) that this was due to a temporary Opera regression (in the new Carakan JavaScript engine [2]).
Left a comment [3] stating that in the desktop blog to reflect that as well. :-)
[1] http://my.opera.com/desktopteam/blog/2010/02/17/no-rest-for-the-wicked [2] http://www.opera.com/docs/changelogs/windows/1050b1/ [3] http://my.opera.com/desktopteam/blog/2010/02/17/no-rest-for-the-wicked?startidx=200#comment19208961
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
